data.title: SAG-AFTRA Foundation
data.meta_description: The SAG-AFTRA Foundation provides a state-of-the-art professional and educational facility for SAG-AFTRA members in New York City. data.text:
The SAG-AFTRA Foundation provides a state-of-the-art professional and educational facility for SAG-AFTRA members in New York City. It includes a Computer Lab, The EIF Voiceover Lab, the NY On-Camera Lab and the Robin Williams Center for Entertainment and Media.

These facilities were made possible by the extraordinary support of the Entertainment Industry Foundation, SAG-AFTRA Motion Picture Players Welfare Fund and PEOPLE.

Whether SAG-AFTRA members live in New York or find themselves there for work-related opportunities, the these facilities are a free resource for all members.
